meanings.definition: Resembling mucus in consistency or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The slimy substance had a mucoidal texture.
meanings.sent2: The gooey material was mucoidal in nature.
meanings.sent3: The mucoidal slime on the floor made it slippery.
meanings.sent4: Her deceitful smile had a mucoidal quality to it.
meanings.sent5: The mucoidal film on the pond shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or containing mucus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the mucoidal properties of the nasal discharge.
meanings.sent2: The tissue sample showed mucoidal characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The mucoidal scent of the flowers attracted bees.
meanings.sent4: His mucoidal voice sounded congested over the phone.
meanings.sent5: The mucoidal secretion helped protect the stomach lining.
